project_descr: This project aims to reduce poverty and vulnerability and enhance the livelihoods of extreme poor people. The project focuses spefically on women and aims to promote women's economic empowerment and decision-making power in the household and community.

outputs.output_descr: This programme supports the Government of Tanzania in eradicating extreme poverty and promoting human rights by scaling up the Productive Social Safety Nets (PSSN), strengthening the national social protection framework and accumulating human capital.
donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_descr: To support implementation of the Sustainable Development Goals (SDG) Fund Livelihoods component of the Social Protection joint programme

document_name: NATIONAL CONSULTANCY TO DEVELOP A PROJECT DOCUMENT ON PRO-POOR VALUE CHAIN DEVELOPMENT OF SOYA BEAN IN TANZANIA
